title: Thank You, Alpha Testers! Sign-Ups Now Closed

replies.body:
Update on access to the alpha client:   Unfortunately, it's taking us longer than expected to unlock access to the alpha for everyone who signed up.  We're really sorry about the delay -- I know it sucks, and we have people working through the weekend to make things move along faster.  We now expect that within a couple of days, we'll have completed alerting everyone who applied that their account can now access the alpha.  

**Keep checking your email for your notification and instructions**, and if you've received an email but still have difficulty getting into the new client, please file a player support ticket so we can take a look at your account and identify what's wrong.  Thanks for bearing with us on this.
it's stupid how they say whoever signs up gets the alpha client to test out but they dont give it to you
they send u a link to download it when u log into ur normal client......... maybe u were too toxic so they said "nope!"
I flame, run it down mid and have been banned 5 times, I got into the alpha after 2 weeks of it being avaliable to signups so no, it has nothing to do with being toxic.
LOL Techy why am I not surprised from this comment?? xD
i haven't been toxic at all, never been reported and yet i haven't gotten access despite the fact that i signed up when they first released the client
Hello? Riot? Signed up for the Alpha as soon as it was announced, haven't been given any access/notifications at all, even for the last two "stuffs closing so everyones getting in now!!"
Lol, i got it after they said it was closed and i have been banned before, that sucks though.
I signed up for the Alpha ages ago and the post linked above said that everyone who has already signed up has been given access, how do I get the alpha client?
log in and it gives you a link to download the new client
I signed up for alpha but this hasn't shown up for me?
Is it similar to when you get things like icons etc?

Yes it is, I just got it today, randomly popped up saying "go download the alpha client" and it takes a few minutes, it will take you to a website where you can download, it may be random but im not sure because i got it instantly.

thank you for the privilege of testing the alpha, looking forward to S-7 even though I've only been playing since 6.13, the progress of this game and the community is fantastic, thank you everyone for making this an enjoyable experiance

So great to see the league community continuing to grow, wish you all the best in your future ventures into ranked!
(Although don't keep your hopes up, I've been playing since season 4 and am still bronze {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} )
how do i aply for the beta?
you cant anymore i dont think, you were able to apply almost 5-6 months ago ;p maybe you still can
Everyone gets the Open Beta, regardless of signing up
I got asked to join the alpha client, however i don't know how to join, can someone help me
Can we Alpha testers get an icon that has an construction site hat on it please, PLEEEEEEEEASE
Seems kinda unfair, considering they randomly choose people to be alpha testers. Someone having something over someone only due to the fact they got lucky is pretty dumb.

But when it's just a summoner icon? Sounds to me like you're slightly salty. Seems perfectly fair that people who contributed to the development of the alpha client should be recognised in some way. Wouldn't be surprised if this happens.
Alpha was good test run cant wait for beta :D
i got an email to download the alpha client i downloaded it and tried to login but it said my acc isnt associated with alpha client?

Yes it means you are not in the system allstarz

Its to late now bro bot come onto my stream and help me with bugs if you want to 
I'm on discord shear the link cheers ALLSTARZ
{{champion:150}} 

https://discord.gg/fQemX  Link Here to the chat
hey so rito if you could hook the alpha testers up with that heimer skin with the hard hat that would be pretty cool :) pls
I received an in game notification saying that i'm in as well as the email, but when i try to log into the alpha client, it says that i haven't got the access to it. Anyone having the same problem?

Didn't get the download link {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
Downloading it anyway to see if it works

Got an email saying I was accepted this morning. Thanks Riot!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
When it is already open-beta and I just got the thumbs up for download on the alpha client. Rito plsss
*everyone* doesn't seem to be everyone hahahaha, please rito. They must of changed the definition without notifying *everyone*
anyone wanting the client just log in and it gives you a link to download the alpha client
Haven't gotten it yet...
well i tried sadly didn't make it
Can you play the rotating game modes with the alpha? because i cant get access to them

> Now we're finally ready for the next phase: open beta. In preparation, we’ve turned off alpha signups and granted access to *everyone* who has already signed up. 

BUt when I downloaded the alpha client, it says "Your account does not have access to the League Client alpha"

I'm 100% sure that I signed up for alpha months ago but was never invited to participate in alpha. 

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
Is there a tab or icon on the Client we press to get the new client?
